website_summaries.verdict: A middle-of-the-road bonnet style hair dryer that delivers more performance than budget options.
pros: Acts as a portable bonnet hair dryer
Cap is large to fit many different head sizes
Settings and controls are easy to use
Easy to find the perfect level of drying
cons: Included hose detaches every so often

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. This is not a good product it will cost money and time
customer_reviews.text: I can tell you this BUYER BEWARE! I'm literally sitting here right now and the hose has melted from the cap connect and the hose has came out of the dryer itself. It has done this from day one . It has this sticky adhesive that melts with the heat and no matter the position they slip out . There is no pro. I guess ooooh it's purple it will burn you if that adhesive hits when the heat is on .
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Roll and Dry
customer_reviews.text: Totally met my expectations. Very easy to use dries hair within 20 mins with rollers on. The bonnet is big and adjustable. Highly recommend this bonnet dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Snow

customer_reviews.title: I am reluctant to recommend the dryer to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous review. The first time I used the dryer, I found that the high temperature is too hot. The uneven distribution of air makes it extremely hot near the hose opening. I had to keep shifting the hose to redirect the direction of the air flow. I had to also manipulate the cap in different directions (e.g., left, right, forward) to help redirect the direction of air flow. The dryer hose is extremely short. During my second use of the dryer, the hose came apart. It blew out of the dryer compartment. I am rating the product a 1 star. For these reasons, I am reluctant to recommend the dryer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It works more less fine, but I didn't expect a faulty device to ...
customer_reviews.text: The air tube broke on the first use, leaving me to repair it with duck tape. It works more less fine, but I didn't expect a faulty device to be included as part of its feature. I feel frustrated; I think it was a rip off! I lost my money once, but you will lose a customer forever.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Arismendi-Pardi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only leaving 4 stars because I've only used it once for my deep conditioner. I LOVE it so far though. I don't have any issues with the pump coming out because you have to make sure you hear it lock in place. I suggest to sit right next to it. The medium setting is hot enough you'll probably never use the high setting. It's lightweight, convenient, and affordable for a college student. I'm very impressed. BUY IT :)
customer_reviews.author: Mel R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old and really have trouble managing wthe curling irons. My medium length hair will be frizzy if left alone. Family members have tried to help me with curling irons but I still have trouble . This hair dryer is perfect for me. Wash hair, roll hair, sit in chair and relax with my hair dryer. Then fluff my non frizzy hair with my fingers, lightly spray hair but let still let it move. 70 is the new 50!
customer_reviews.author: Katielou05

customer_reviews.title: WORST EVER
customer_reviews.text: THE WORST EVER! 1. The tube always pops out, won't stay on the bonnet - while the dryer is ON! 2. It takes forever put the tube back into the storage compartment - almost impossible 3. stuffing the bonnet it the compartment is also a struggle. The previous model was SO MUCH BETTER! Whoever designed this model should be FIRED! Its a BASIC design. I wish I could get my money back!!! I never write product reviews but had to on this one. Seriously, the worst hair dryer I have ever used. Amazon should stop selling this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E Guilbaud

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a dryer to do my deep conditioners at home and purchased this one. It’s an ok product but price wise I get why it’s not the best quality. The hose always comes off of the cap that’s used to dry my hair, since day one. It’s only glued in so when the heat gets to it, it pretty much just falls off. The heat doesn’t distribute evenly so one side will dry fast than the other. And the hose just isn’t long enough to not sit at a weird angle. It’s cool but should have gotten something better.
customer_reviews.author: kierstin

customer_reviews.title: Hot Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months and the bonnet has completely fallen apart. The heat from the dryer loosened the glue and basically rendered the bonnet useless. And if that’s not bad enough, you can’t purchase a replacement bonnet anywhere. You will have to purchase an entirely new unit. NEVER AGAIN. I will not be purchasing anything else from Laila Ali or this distributor. They should be ashamed of selling such a crap product.
customer_reviews.author: April T.

customer_reviews.title: Great little hair dryer!!! Hair is soft, smooth, and no frizz! Bonnet covers big rollers!  Medium works well.
customer_reviews.text: Takes nearly 20 minutes longer to dry my Long hair on top of my head. Hot too hot. Love that the bonnet covers over my big-big rollers!!! Wish air flow was stronger to puffed up higher on top. Love the choice of heats as I only used medium and low. LOVED that my hair turned out smooth, not frizzy and soooo soft!!! Thanks so much for the "ionic" !!! Used the day after I received it and it did a good job, just had to adjust to lower heat as I also did on my old machine---Grandma's, "Lady Schick Time Machine!" with hard plastic bonnet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this dryer weekly for over 3 years now, and I really like it. It is very straightforward and easy to use, and packs away nicely. I haven't ever needed the high setting as medium is hot enough to dry my shoulder length hair in a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: DanaM

customer_reviews.title: Works right
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Laila Ali soft bonnet hair dryer and the hair salon will not be seeing me for a long time. I will be styling my own hair at home. This cute travel size soft bonnet hair dryer is lightweight, gets hot, and only took 30 minutes to dry my roller set. I also did a deep condition and a Saran Silk Wrap with it. This is the best thing I’ve purchased for “myself” in a long time. I Love It and so does my hair💁🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Maria A Freeman

customer_reviews.title: BUYYER BEWARE CAUSES BURNS TO THE SKIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: The dryer heats well but BEWARE the hose gets so hot that it causes burns !!! This dryer should be taken off the market because it can definitely cause bodily injuries to its users. The hose should not get so hot that it burns the skin. I only used it on medium heat. Very, very, concerned!!!Again, it DOES NOT NEED TO BE ON THE MRKET UNTIL THIS ISSUE IS FIXED!!!
customer_reviews.author: bav

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it four stars for efficiency even though the tube pops off which I think is an easy fix for anyone
customer_reviews.text: my daughter and I have been using this for the last couple months. All the comments regarding the hose popping off is correct. My husband silicone the tube and the cap together or you can put a clamp of some type to hold it on. Other than that, it works well and we have been enjoying sitting watching TV while our hair dries. I would have given it four stars for efficiency even though the tube pops off which I think is an easy fix for anyone. However, it is made of a very thin cheap plastic. With all that said it works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this dryer if you want to buy a new one every year
customer_reviews.text: I brought this dryer less than a year ago. I only use it once a week for my deep conditioning. So it is not used much. And, I already have to buy another one, because this one has broken. The plastic part at the end of the hose that connects it to the bonnet has cracked in several places. And, of course, there is no way to buy a replacement :( I am truly disappointed. It worked well for the first few months, and as other reviewers have stated, it gets really hot. But, this product is not a good investment. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Savvyshopper101

customer_reviews.title: Air Hose is Awefully Short
customer_reviews.text: The dryer can get too hot for comfort, but that’s a good thing. It gets the job done in short time. I simply turn down the heat setting when it starts to get too warm. However, it is annoying that the air hose is infuriatingly short. It’s sooo short that I almost have to WEAR the dryer on my body. Come on, guys...! You couldn’t have given us a mere six more inches to the air hose, just so we can comfortably turn our heads from left to right?
customer_reviews.author: VickiDK

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit; heat not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Has two heat settings only: unbearably hot, and cold. Only has elastic at the front edge, the back has to be bunched up and tied with attached strings - does not fit or stay on well, and does not contain the airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Dryer!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dryer! Some of the reviews were making me a little wary of buying it but I'm glad I did! I wanted something that was not only functional but also easy on the eyes...which is why I love the purple color! The bonnet was very snug around my head and did not make me feel like it was going to fall off every five seconds, and it dries my roller sets in under an hour!...so overall, a very good dryer that I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Dries my 4c hair in 20 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: This little dryer is great. I'm glad I finally broke down and tried it. The only reason it gets four stars instead of five is the tube feels kind of flimsy and I had to fight with it to come out and when I went to put it back in. Over time I feel like this could damage the tube so I hope it gets easier! I put my hair in rollers and sat with it on high. After about five minutes it started burning my neck so I put it on medium which was much more comfortable. Completely dried my hair in 20 minutes. I can't wait to use it again with out rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Beezee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed -
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer so I could deep condition my hair. Thank goodness I don't have to use it everyday. Bonnet is very uncomfortable. The edges are stiff and hard. The hose doesn't want to stay connected to bonnet while in use. So I had to hold it the whole time. After just one use - the hose doesn't want to go back in. The dryer itself is rather loud. Guess I just expected too much from an item I paid $50+ .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bonnet Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Bonnet Dryer works amazing. It does get pretty hot so I see no need to turn it all the way up. Medium works just fine. I read that people where having trouble putting it together, so I checked out a YouTube video that help me. If your interesting in getting one but not sure how it works just check out a video. Also it gets pretty hot, so I would recommend leaving it on medium. I use this for deep conditioning my hair and works great. I do love that it has adjust straps on the bonnet to help tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bonnet fits over my rollers nicely heats up really well I have it on medium
customer_reviews.text: I just washed my hair and decided to use my dryer. The bonnet fits over my rollers nicely heats up really well I have it on medium, I dont think I can stand hotter than that but it does have another option high. The medium fits me fine. It not very loud but you know the dryer is on. Its compact convenient and I would recommend to anyone who wants to let go of the flat iron and hand blow dryer. The curls last longer under a dryer anyway! Good luck money well spent for me....
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: ... the setting below high and I didn't have burns like others reported
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as described only downfall it does get very hot i never put it on high always on the setting below high and I didn't have burns like others reported. Also i bout an extension cord and as long as its sitting on the chair next to me its always enough length. I recommend wearing t-shirt slightly thick the heat from the tubing falls on your back and it can be uncomfortable on your skin.. it may cause a burn if it laying on skin for a long period of time
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Very good but had some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. The high heat is super hot so be careful. Also be aware of the hose resting on your skin when it’s on high or medium heat. It will burn you.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: I LOVVVEEEEEE this product!!
customer_reviews.text: The Laila Ali Bonnet dryer is a beautiful purple hue. It is compact, lightweight and extremely easy to use. DO NOT USE THE HIGHEST HEAT SETTING! When Laila says "High heat", she means it. It was so hot that I immediately started confessing my sins and wondered what on EARTH I did wrong to deserve the nape of my neck to feel like a cast iron griddle. My twistout was dry in 25 minutes on medium! My hair density is akin to Greek Men's chest hair, i.e. Thick. I love the dryer! 😍😍 P.S. Don't drink alcohol while using it, you WILL cause yourself to have a hot flash.
customer_reviews.author: SaltandPepper Slay

customer_reviews.title: Works but.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for applying heat for hair treatments at home. I do wish the hose was longer and when you use it, the purple box is not stable- it just slides around on the surface you place it on. The heat function works well. I tried to put hard rollers in my hair and put the cap over them to dry which DOES NOT work. The cap doesn't stretch wide enough so you are basically moving and pulling the rollers away from your head when you try to get the cap on. The only purpose I have for this now is when I put treatment masks on my hair and put the cap on for heat/ steam treatment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heating cap
customer_reviews.text: Great heating cap. I love the way that the hose and cap goes back into the case. In my experience using this heating cap, low works great for deep conditioning. Medium might be too hot but everyone tolerance level is different. I also like that the bonnet is not sliding over my eyes and I have to keep readjusting. I am purchasing one for my sister. Give this a try. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jus Cruizing

customer_reviews.title: Compact Power
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is so compact yet powerful. Prior to this, I used a heated cap which was not powerful enough. Also, I used a hooded dryer which was inconvenience to use. This dryer combines power and convenience together. I used it today to deep condition my hair for two hours while lying on the sofa and reading. I would never be able to do that with my hooded dryer. The indirect heat on this dryer is powerful and the dryer itself it so compact. I am so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha W.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hates sitting under the dryer but she had no problem sitting under this one. She had thick hair and it doesn't take forever for her hair to dry we've had it for over a year and some change. It's still working like the first day we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: goldy02

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it bc it's laila ali's product and support black ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month and decided to send it back for my $$. I wanted to like it bc it's laila ali's product and support black business owners, but it just didnt do it for me and wasn't really worth keeping. The bonnet isnt big enough for large rollers and the circulation sucks. Whether on medium or high setting, after an hr 1/2 your hair will still be damp! (I have medium length hair) and I just wasnt going to sit under here for hrs on hrs, especially when I used it 2x a week. I decided to just buy a real hard hat dryer and go on my way.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Runs great, although I would only use on medium heat to avoid overheating the plastic. It gets hit quickly. It use it to partially dry my hair, then finish with a diffuser upside b/c I find it can make my rather fine curls a little flat on the top of my head. I like lots of volume. The only real downside is the plastic air tube that leads to the cap is really short, so I have to find a place to perch it up high near my chair or head. It can't sit on the floor next to my chair or couch. Overall, great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Glue will melt off the hose
customer_reviews.text: The heat output is excellent. But it works so well it melted the hose after the first use. The black part that connects the hose to the plastic cap doesn’t stay and got sticky stuff all over that isn’t easy to clean. Trying to repair it with super glue wasn’t very easy either. I’d advise to spend a bit more and get a better dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for. Compact, effective, and cute. I've never had to use the high setting because the medium is plenty hot. The only con is the storage space for the bonnet and hose. I like that it's compact but i feel like I'm going to tear the hose or bonnet while trying to force them back into their compartments. I started leaving them out of the dryer to prevent this. Otherwise, great product and cheaper than my local bs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia the Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I had a terrible problem opening the hose
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this dryer. I had a terrible problem opening the hose. It wouldn't release in order for me to pull it open. And this product has a flimsy feeling to it. I loved the purple color, but I was very nervous about keeping an item that relies on pushing the tubing back into the body of the dryer. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree P. Gilkey

customer_reviews.title: The high heat is a bit much for very long but the other 2 heat levels are just fine. Pop it on
customer_reviews.text: I bought long foam twist rollers & needed a bonnet hairdryer to set my hair. This little thing is light but powerful. I put it on, put my headphones on, run it on high for a few minutes, then reduce it to middle. The high heat is a bit much for very long but the other 2 heat levels are just fine. Pop it on, listen to an audio book or movie with earbuds in, and let it do it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer, short hose
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dryer, it gets really hot. I like the way the bonnet fits, however the hose could be longer and the way it secures to the bonnet could be better as well. But over all I like it and it dries my bra strap length locs pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Syd__82

customer_reviews.title: poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Used this bonnet hair dryer for the first time today. The hose connector fell off of the hose after about 45 minutes with the heat setting between medium and low. Because I bought it in February, can't return so using duck tape to hold the connector to the hose. Should have listened to other reviews that stated poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: auntiek

customer_reviews.title: Good hands-free dryer
customer_reviews.text: Generous cap (fits medium-large rollers) Works better if hair is towel dried and sectioned onto more rollers (more effective and lessens dry time) Using first heat setting and cool setting; higher heat settings may be okay for very thick hair Compact storage; lightweight for carrying Hose to cap is short and occasionally disconnects because it does not lock into place; easy to reconnect and will stay attached at certain angles (no need to hold it there) Recommend extension cord Protect ears from heat by keeping them outside of cap Update: Reduced rating from 4 to 3 stars due to how noisy this unit is.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: The heat is great, BUT it sound like a 727 running in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say, but this unit just doesn't work well. If you set it upon a countertop it vibrates off and topples down. Also, it is a struggle to get the bonnet, the hose, and the cord back into the unit. My 82 year old mother just couldn't do it. The heat is great, BUT it sound like a 727 running in the house. I love Liala, wish her name wasn't on such an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: sunny1

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. Convenient to be able to just place the head piece on and watch tv or read. If the hose is not positioned correctly and on a high temperature it will burn your ear but that is natural. Just adjust or add a towel. I have very thick hair and the heat is hot enough for me to try, although it does take an hour with braids. But again that is normal for me even with a salon dryer.
customer_reviews.author: TeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Yeeeeezzz!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is everything I was hoping it would be, have it on now and sitting very comfortably doing my deep conditioning before braids. I had no issue with getting the bonnet out of the device (if you take your time...it IS plastic...it will not rip... hint hint) I have tried other bonnet dryers and this is by far the best. The bonnet stays put once you tighten it as desired, it is a bit loud but really who cares! It is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Taneika Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hot Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer, I've had it for almost a year. I have mid-back length hair and use large purple rollers. This dryer gets nice, hot and usually dries my hair in hour some change. My only issue is the hose locks in place but doesn't stay all the time especially if I move a couple times. Other than that I love this dryer. Previously own the gold n hot bonnet dryer which the bonnet stretched out other time...this one is still snug as the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Silkiegrey

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good dryer. I did not expect that the dryer would exceed my expectations but it did. The bonnet is pretty soft and durable. The heat can get very hot on the highest settings. My hair dries within 20 minutes. I don't wear rollers so it may take longer with them. The case is very stylish but lightweight. The electrical cord and hose are neatly hidden within the case. I had not seen a bonnet dryer since the 80s so I wasn't sure what it would be like. But, I have to say that I have been pleasantly surprised by this product. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Yes, the hose os short but if you have it next to you, which I did while I was surfing the Internet, then it is not a problem. The hose popped out once but after I put it back in I didn't have any problems. You can't do any vigirous activity, duh, but as long as you are just sitting there doing normal stuff, reading, surfing, writing, etc then there are no problems. Def. worth the price. I love this dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cozad

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my dryer on Wednesday and using it for the first time today. So far so good, I don't have any complaints, it's a bit noisey, but what hair dryer is not, even the one at my hair salon is noisey lol. I. Sitting on the couch watching movies & relaxing while drying my hair. I have a pixie haircut so my hair dried pretty quickly.I suggest you place a towel around your neck / upper back because the cord gets hot :)
customer_reviews.author: TAMIKA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this several times with medium size rollers and have had no problems with this at all. It is light, easily stored and can be used anywhere, I usually watch TV or read a book while using it. As for the hose coming out of the bonnet, TWIST it AFTER insertion so that it locks in place. I wish I had found this before. I can't guarantee that it will feet large rollers comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as promised
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars, I would say close to 4.5 I recieved it on Thursday, using it for the 1st , as I write this review. At first sight not likely going to live up to its reviews. I feeling the heat, nice and snug with the string . I wish the air flow tube was a lil longer , for a 800watt soft bonnet hair dryer . works great thus far. Again 1st time use with ( D.C. /creme of nature ) 20mins under. So far no problems . .* Every body hair texture and head shape will have a differnet view of one product. - the Laila Ali LADR5604 .works ok with no problems at this moment for me
customer_reviews.author: Taneek W.

customer_reviews.title: Works but a little defective
customer_reviews.text: I am using this dryer right now for the first time. Have it on medium which is warm enough. Will only be using for deep conditioning treatments. A little loud, but will only have on for 20 min or so, so can deal with it. Love the style and color and the bonnet is big and fits well. My issue is the hose does not lock. Have to turn the bonnet to the side so it sits just so and not fall out. Not a deal breaker for what I'm using it for but should not be the case. May return.
customer_reviews.author: trace

customer_reviews.title: Literally used it the day I received it!
customer_reviews.text: Literally used this the day I received it! The hose did slip out of the bonnet three times and I had to turn the bonnet around to target the other side of my head so it would dry quicker (I was in a rush) but I tend to find this to be the same with most bonnet dryers and unlike ones I've had in the past- the highest setting is fantastic! It will melt your eyebrows- overall it's powerful and compact! I'm here for it!
customer_reviews.author: Leather Tuscadero

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer, but made of cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. It is very light weight and stores away easily. The bonnet is large enough to accommodate a large head, with rollers. It gets VERY hot. In other dryers, I would usually use a HIGH setting. However, with this dryer I'm able to use the low setting and achieve the same results in the same amount of time. I love that I can watch TV while drying my hair because it isn't very noisy. My only complaint is that it is made from a cheap plastic and looks more like a toy. For this reason, I'm only giving 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: NOT a quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a bonnet dryer that I’ve had for 15 years and the bonnet finally needed replacing. Unfortunately that company no longer had replacements parts. I was very disappointed when, the first time I used this new dryer, the hose separated from the plastic piece that held it to the bonnet (the plastic piece stayed attached to the bonnet). Compared to my old dryer, the new one is very cheaply made. The casing is lightweight, the bonnet is not particularly large, and air does not blow with enough power to completely inflate the bonnet, all in addition to the hose that doesn’t stay connected to the bonnet.
customer_reviews.author: joyrob

customer_reviews.title: Bonnet is IMPOSSIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dryer for about 3 weeks. I’ve been using it for deep conditioning. I’m using it as I type this review. I love how compact it is, all the pieces fit inside. It’s also pretty flat so storage is a breeze. HOWEVER the bonnet does not stay attached to the hose. It features a simple turn and lock attachment but it constantly falls out and that is stopping me from loving this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: unsure about this one....
customer_reviews.text: I brought this hair dryer to use on my husband dreads and occasional use by myself whenever I'm in the mood for a roller set. I love the color of it and all its compact departments. But what I don't like is the fact that it Drys your hair fast but once u take your head out the dryer it seems as if it's not as dry as u thought. In other words, my scalp be burning cause it's so hot and it feels really dry but once u turn the heat off your hair feels a lil wet???... If this even make sense to anyone. Lol. Basically I like the product but I'm torn on its function.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Gurl

customer_reviews.title: I like the three heat setting choices and the product does ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the three heat setting choices and the product does dry my hair as intended. So far as I can see, it's the best product available through Amazon that does what I want it to. But it came short of 5 stars because the hose often comes out of the bonnet if the wearer stirs too much and the noise is loud. I watch movies while sitting under it and I have to pump up the volume considerably. I like the handy compartments for storage and the neat way it folds up out of the way. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The product is as advertised, but I found it really difficult to put the good over the rollers without messing up the rollers. And the cord is really short so I couldn’t put on makeup or move at all while wearing it without messing up the rollers even more. Also, the elastic made marks on my forehead. It just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, does what it claims.. I have very little hair so I have to be careful because on high, it does burn my scalp (I have to brush it evenly so no scalp is showing. I love that it has high, medium, low and cool settings. I do have to wear a thick headband under it because the heat hits my ears and does burn a bit. I also use a small towel on the back of my neck for the same reason. I knocked off a star because the tube that goes from the machine to the headpiece, is wayyy to small, which is inconvenient if you are applying your makeup (moving around) while drying your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tania M. Loaisiga

customer_reviews.title: Lalia delivers another's knockout !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bonnet hair dryer, only it does not look like the picture. The hose and bonnet are black and it's stored in the body not the side end like shown , it just looks totally different from the picture. But I love it , I already said that. It gets really hot dries my hair in half the time. I have really thick hair, it usually takes 2 1/2 hrs for a roller set to dry. With this dryer it dries in maybe 1 1/2 . And for a good price under $40 . I don't mine spending my money when the product delivers this kind of result..
customer_reviews.author: DivaPJ

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Hot and Dries Fast
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dryer for a couple of years now and use it frequently. I am african american so I need a very hot dryer. This heats up fast and can actually burn your ears if you aren't careful. I use the mid range setting most of the time. The only problem is that the hose comes a loose very eadily but I can deal with that.This is definitely a great buy. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: nors

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had a bonnet replacement
customer_reviews.text: The real problem for me has been the bonnet ,it immediately ripped within the second use. I have tried finding a replacement bonnet but no luck. I have shoulder length hair and it takes about an hour on high setting to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: A comparison of the two Laila hair dryers
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the other Laila Ali dryer last year, which is a bigger version. I had some problems with the hose attachment. I couldn't unattach the hose from the bonnet, however, it does have a nice long hose and very large bonnet. After about nine months use, the hot setting got a lot weaker. The second Laila product I bought,which is shown, is working nicely, and it is smaller and more compact, which doesn't matter to me, but the hose is shorter than I'd like. I'd like about three inches more for easier use. So far the product works well, but it is very new right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dryer, and very lite and works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice hair dryer. I have long hair, and had some arm surgery so my arm hurts to keep it up in the air to blow dry it. I just towel dry it some and then put it in the cap and tie it on and it does it faster, then I can just use my rotating curler unit to get out some of the curls that I got from the blow dryer, laid flat. Nice unit, very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic dryer! I don't have storage space for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic dryer! I don't have storage space for the traditional hard dryer and this compact purple dryer is fantastic. It functions perfectly and air flow is great throughout the soft bonnet part. On wash days, I tend to use it twice- Once with a deep conditioner in and then to dry my twist out. One difficulty that I've had with it is sometimes the bonnet separates from the hose. I mainly just reposition where the connection to the bonnet and hose are and try to make sure I have them connected securely. Otherwise, I really like the fact that it is very compact and all components are stored within the purple case.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works great but it is extremely noisy. I like to sit under the dryer and watch television when drying my hair, but I have to turn the volume up so loud on the tv to hear it over the dryer. Also the hose to the dryer is not very long. It does, however, work very well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because of its good reviews but when I first tried it this item just dissapointed me. I washed my hair, put them in curlers (rolos) and sat under the dryer. First, the air blows mostly on one side (where the air exit is) so it took forever to dry, and it didn't even dry all that well, second the plastic hat smells way to strong like plastic and my hair and myself smelled like plastic afterwards (I don't know if I had to wash it previously or what), I didn't like the end result. Not using it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: MelonT

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle/Hose continuously falls off ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Although this dryer does the job of drying my hair, the nozzle continues to fall off which continuously slows down the drying process, which is definitely frustrating. I have yet to find any dryer made like this that the hose does not continue to fall....maybe someone else seeing this review can provide another solution.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Moody

customer_reviews.title: I also got it because it hard for kids to keep still and I thought this would be a better option when deep conditioning my 8 y/o
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer to have a bit more movement than allowed in the other kind of hooded dryer. I find with even with the slightest moment the hose falls out and I have to constantly take off the cap to reattach the hose. I also got it because it hard for kids to keep still and I thought this would be a better option when deep conditioning my 8 y/o. Again issues with the hose attachment. I'm in the market for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dennelle

customer_reviews.title: super convinient
customer_reviews.text: I like the how easy this is to setup and how powerful this little machine is.
customer_reviews.author: metraa

customer_reviews.title: Hot Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my sister who wanted a bonnet dryer. She loves it. She says it drys her thick hat in a timely manner and gets hot quickly. She loves the purple color!
customer_reviews.author: Annette W.

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Works great, portable, light weight. Only problem, the place where they store the cap has sharp corners, so the cap got torn pulling it out of it's storage compartment on the 3rd use. Can't find a replacement. Big picture, it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible smell.
customer_reviews.text: The dryer works great, but it unfortunately gives off an odor that smells like burnt plastic. I was hoping the smell would dissipate after a few uses, but I’ve used this weekly and the smell is still there. It’s so strong I’m going to stop using this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of trying to find a comfortable position to sit in using my hard cover dryer and decided to try this. This dryer is much more efficient, heat doesn't escape into the air, all of the heat is directed to my hair. Takes less time to dry, even on the medium setting(with hard cover I always needed to use the high heat setting) and I have pretty thick hair. Most importantly, I can sit where ever I want to sit. So comfortable and efficient. It's worth every penny. I won't ever be without one again..
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So, as many of you have pointed out the hose doesn't stay connected to the bonnet. That is it in a nut shell. Noisy as all get out. I've used it but as others have said, you have to more the bonnet around and around to actually dry your whole head. I have had this many years and now I'll look for the bonnet that fits my hand held dryer. Can't do worse.
customer_reviews.author: brisinger

customer_reviews.title: Salon deep cond and drying at home
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing a review as I use this dryer.. I'm awfully impressed with the functionality and heat settings. My deep conditioning was so relaxing and now I'm drying my hair. Awwww so nice and relaxing and it's less expensive than a salon. I have no cons at this time I just hope it last.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the dryer, the attached hose for the cap falls out repeatedly while in use. Have to hold it in place while drying. It's really cute and portable to take when traveling. Just wish it didnt have the flaw with those attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I have thick shoulder length hair. This dryer takes about 20 minutes to dry it. Within the first week of use the tube that goes to the bonnet got a hole in it from taking it in and out of the storage compartment since it has sharp edges. The same thing happened with the bonnet. I have a hard time getting the tube to stay attached to the bonnet. If the setting is on medium or higher the metal in the tubing gets so hot that if it touches bare skin it burns it. I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: MAT

customer_reviews.title: It's Good But....
customer_reviews.text: The bonnet won't stay connected to the hose. It's too loose. I had to insert a few bobby pins to keep it from untwisting itself. The motor casing also moves even when the unit is on low, so you have to weigh it down with something. Other than that the materials are nice and the heat workes well.
customer_reviews.author: Devona Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see a difference except I lost an hour of time I'll never get back
customer_reviews.text: I'm a white Czech girl with natural curly hair. If there's a product made for us curly girls I've bought it. Nothing I've tried has worked. My hair always ends up frizzy wild woman crazy. Laila Ali's dryer was a last ditch effort to tame the fro. Sadly it didn't work. I sat under the cap for an hour (drove me nuts to sit in once place that long). Even with product in my hair following ALL the directions I came out with a fluffy, halfway dry, cap shaped hair. Granted my hair was soft, but soft helmet hair isn't any better than frizzy crunchy hair. Anyone have recommendations?
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Kaye Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: My bag didn't inflate much. It's like there wasn't enough air circulating and yet I had the tube properly snapped into the bonnet. The bonnets elastic was a little bit tight around my head....the bonnet itself was roomy but the elastic didn't have much slack to adjust it to loosen up so I ended up with an imprint on my forehead from it. The dryer gets hot and had the bag properly inflated I might have kept it. Returning was easy. I should also mention I agree with the other reviews that stated the sound is kinda loud when it's running. I've had other bonnet dryers that weren't so loud.
customer_reviews.author: MzNeke

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I like this dryer it's pretty handy and I'm able to move it around the house with no problem. When I put it n "high" it gets very hot but then I adjust it to the medium setting. So to me that's a good sign because you don't have to worry about this dryer not getting hot enough. I use it every week or week and a half and my hair is conditioned well and soft. The price was just right for it and I was able to save some money. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MyCatsTakeRevenge

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I found this dryer somewhat bulky. If you’re thinking of putting this in a suitcase you run the risk of getting cracks in the covering /case for the dryer. It’s brittle and liable to break. After using the machine about five times the air tube which is connected to the machine became dislodged. I suspect the heat may have caused that. Whatever the reason there is no way to reconnect it. In the end it wasn’t worth it for me as I’m now stuck with a machine which is fairly new and which I can’t use. Sigh
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Reid

customer_reviews.title: I previously had a Laila bonnet dryer and loved it. The hose finally ripped so it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This dryer heats well. However, the bonnet is way too small . I can't get it over my curlers and when I do it digs into my skin. Also, it is difficult to set up....attaching the hose several times....then struggling with the bonnet. Then it is a struggle to put it away because the hose has to fit in a very small space. I previously had a Laila bonnet dryer and loved it. The hose finally ripped so it is now unusable. It was a quality product and easy to use. I wish they would market that product again.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: My hair looks shiny with NO FRIZZ!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, very curly hair. In the winter, it literally takes hours to air dry. But, with my trusty Laila Ali (secret weapon, ok apparently not so secret...), my hair dries in perfect shiny curls, no frizz whatsoever. I can get my whole head relatively dry in the time it takes me to apply my makeup (about 15 minutes). Thank you for making such an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Davis

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The hood ripped as I was removing it from the storage area. So I figure what the heck and slapped some tape on it. It does get really hot if I have it on anything but the cool setting. Dries my really thick hair in about an hour and a half even when I put in rollers. I am pretty sure I will buy another one. Only wish the power cord and hose were longer
customer_reviews.author: K. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is light weight and air circulation is good. The high heat setting proved too hot, but the medium was quite warm and comfortable. According to warranty information, Helen of Troy is the maker. The bonnet felt stiff until it warmed up, but then it softened and billowed out effectively. At first, the bonnet slid out of the hose attachment. After I worked on it a few seconds, it clicked into place and held steady. I didn't attempt to jam the bonnet back into the small port on the side -- it was tough enough to pry it out of there.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Much Better!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm mad at myself for not purchasing this dryer a long time ago. First of all everything is in the purple case. Second, it doesn't take up nearly as much space as a the commonly used hair dryer. Finally, this item does the job exceptionally well. I have had dreads for five years now, which means they are long. My normal hair dryer was not drying my dreads fully. Laila Ali's Bonnet Dryer allows me to fully cover my dreads, which means they turn out beautifully styled every time!!!!! I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laketta Lowery

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I brought it for my niece, because she loves it. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my niece. My niece has very long and thick hair and all of it fit in the large cap. It doesn't take long for her hair to dry. The cap gets hot very fast, so make sure you have a towel around your shoulder, to keep from burning your skin. My niece loves it, because less time waiting for her hair to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is nice and has a sleek design that I love. It heats well and I love that it has compartments for each piece. However it is louder than I expected. But I still like the convenience of sitting in my bed while my hair is drying. Over all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandrina Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it fits directly on my head. It's easy to take along on trips. Fits nicely in your suitcase. Hate the fact that the hose gets REALLY HOTT when in use. You would have to lay a towel across your neck and back to be comfortable. Other than that. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY

customer_reviews.title: laila ali bonnet dryer a sure KNOCK OUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I certainly appreciate the great quality in this product. Everything about it is strong and sturdy and built to last. I love the convince of being able to move about while watching tv or reading a book etc. It easily fits under the cabinet or under the bed. I Love it and use it to dry my twist/braid out styles. It can be used to accelerate deep conditioning too. Although I have a steamer for that purpose I would certainly be able to use this as well. The price was right. I went to sallys to price them. Amazon beats the competition and also free shipping too!! can't beat that
customer_reviews.author: t nelson

customer_reviews.title: This dryer gets HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Used this dryer to style my hair for a wedding. I have very long hair and the dryer performed beautifully and gets super hot. Sit under a fan while drying your hair or you will melt. Great for deep conditioning too. Good product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: FL Gators#1

customer_reviews.title: the hose is SUPER SHORT. Would be perfect 2x the length
customer_reviews.text: Just received... SUPER DISAPPOINTED. First off the unit that "IsaReviewer" features is NOT the same one as the one that arrived. It kinda looks the same- purple and black.. however mine does not open like a suitcase. Instead you have to shove the hose and bonnet back into the unit through a little hole.. AND the hose does not stay attached to the BONNET. ITs as if the company decided to totally downgrade quality to make more money . What a sham... and what a shame. Will be looking for a much higher quality unit. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: I love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. The hose, bonnet and cord, fit inside so well, unlike the old bonnet dryers, making it a breeze to use and put away. It heats up very well, and the bonnet allows the are to circulate will, avoiding hot spots. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact I like how the hose stays connected to the dryer and you can just push it back in when done as well as the power cord and bonnet. Downside is the hose is not long enough u literally have to have the dryer right next to you. There is no happy medium between the temperatures medium is not hot enough and high gets too hot at times. I have only use it for deep conditioning and I think the results are good despite the things I dislike. Unlike a huge hard hooded bonnet it stores away so nice and neatly and hardly takes up any space
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence-Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Good hair dryer, I'm a AA w/ natural hair. I use it for deep conditioning and setting twist outs, etc. Coming from the sucky one that you attatch to your handheld dryer, this one is great! Nice, even, REAL heat. Very streamlined and storage friendly. Happy with purchase. Side note : you do need a towl for your neck, but that's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: DATS group

customer_reviews.title: very hard to keep hose attached to cap
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think there's a perfect dryer bonnet out there. The pros of this one are that it has multiple heat settings and if you can keep it on it seems to work well. It's also nice that it can be so compact when you're putting it away. The cons are the hose keeps falling out of the cap, the bonnet doesn't fit quite so well but manageable, and it's very loud, much louder than I expected. I probably shouldn't complain so much about the loudness though because of the regular blow dryer handheld is loud as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Good Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Works as indicated. Does generate some static electricity. Do not like lid latch.. seems like it will break easily. Do not like on/off and heat setting locations. Seems like controls should be on outside. Flimsy lid must stay open to operate. Wd be better if it cd operate w/ lid closed. This would not be an issue if lid latch were more sturdy or had a reliable, strong hold-open option. Anyway, drying capabilities work fine, once you adjust bonnet on head properly. I recommend this unit if u don't want to incur damage from blow drying your hair. Needs to rest/sit on stable horizontal surface in order to operate.
customer_reviews.author: DinkyShop

customer_reviews.title: Slow air output
customer_reviews.text: It was great the first 4 times I used it and now the air flow seems to be coming out less & less. Unfortunately the window to return it just passed last week so now I’m stuck with it air or no air!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet !!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this machine ! I do conditioner treatments weekly and this is the perfect machine for it ! Very easy to use , easy to put away and it's lite weight !
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This little dryer does big things. It gets very hot but with the multiple settings, you can adjust it. The hose, cap, and cord fit conveniently in the dryer. I did have issues with the hose connecting to the cap. I think you just have to make sure it is screwed in completely before use. I use it for deep conditioning and roller sets.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: that's really annoying & makes me not want to use it
customer_reviews.text: They really need to figure out the hose situation. Some kinda locking system or something. If every time I move the hose comes out, that's really annoying & makes me not want to use it. Then I have to take the whole bonnet off to put it back in. Too many people have complained about this, for y'all not to have fixed it by now. And the hose gets crazy hot, even on low. Other than that...it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bellakai

product_meta.title: Laila Ali LADR5604 Ionic Soft Bonnet Dryer, Purple with White Bonnet
product_meta.description: Ionic soft bonnet dryer uses ion infused airflow to dry hair quickly, and is perfect for drying roller sets and braids as well as processing chemical and conditioning treatments. The ionic technology helps retain moisture to prevent breakage for shinier, healthier-looking hair styles. With 3 heat and speed settings, you have the flexibility to dry and style your hair exactly the way you want. When you are done you can use the cool setting, which releases cool air to help set the style. The purple and black adjustable soft bonnet can accommodate a set of jumbo rollers so you can create loose curls and waves quickly. The bonnet comes with a compact and convenient storage case that holds the entire unit, including the power cord.
feature_bullets: Note:White Bonnet is stored inside storage. Ensure you open the storage to verify the same.
Unit is perfect for drying roller sets and braids as well as processing chemical and conditioning treatments.
Conditioning IONS help retain moisture to prevent breakage for shinier, healthier-looking styles.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars2,966 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
